divs: Sighting DetailsMy mother and I were returning from getting some burgers and turn westbound off of HWY 54 facing white sands national park when my mother stated that that orange light that was above the mountains in the sky looked like the unexplained lights looked the week before she and my sister saw but they turned two two lights and no sooner did she state that the light became 2 lights and then emerging from the the UFO another light would appear as if it was coming from inside the UFO to its left. it did this until there were 8 in a perfect row horizontaly and then 2 more appeared to the left of the 8 and then they dispeared into the night.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Alamogordo
There was one other sighting in Alamogordo on or around January 5th 2010
Summary: one orange light appeared and multiplied into ten lights and then disapeared
